body:
I found the addition of hip-rocclr is not required for some of the recipes. only rocrand is requiring it .
i built these changes for rocm-4.1.0 and rocm-4.2.0 to check if there are any failures and did not encounter them.
any inputs for additional testing i am okay to do and confirm.
rocm-opencl-runtime is not required as there is another recipe rocm-opencl.
title: modfiy hip-rocclr references for 4.1.0 and 4.2.0 releases
